Comments_List: I learned a lot about how formulate, conduct, and summarize research.

I think that I learned a lot about how to complete research work on my own. I think it could have been interesting to have meetings throughout the semester with other senior Applied Math majors working on their theses.
I would recommend this course to another student. I think that the Applied Math senior thesis is very flexible which is great because it allows students to engage in research of their choosing.
Pretty fair senior thesis. Little restrictions/guidelines so you have a lot of freedom.
